{"2":{"id":"2","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"Gi\u1edbi Thi\u1ec7u Chung","tenbaiviet_en":"About Us","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Hi\u1ec7n nay, ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng l&agrave; 2 n\u1ec1n t\u1ea3ng c\u1ed1t y\u1ebfu quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t c&ocirc;ng ty. Toska-Bano&#39;k - th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v\u1ec1 ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c v\u1edbi h\u01a1n 50 n\u0103m kinh nghi\u1ec7m \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 tin t\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1eeb ph&iacute;a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch nhanh ch&oacute;ng, hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i Toska - Bano&#39;k \u0111&atilde; m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng th&ecirc;m c&aacute;c c\u01a1 s\u1edf s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; b&aacute;n h&agrave;ng t\u1ea1i \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute;. V&agrave;o th&aacute;ng 7 n\u0103m 2014, c&ocirc;ng ty TNHH V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th&agrave;nh l\u1eadp v&agrave; ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ch&acirc;m &quot;&quot;Made in Viet Nam with Japanese Standard&quot;&quot;. C&ocirc;ng ty TNHH V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok chuy&ecirc;n cung c\u1ea5p c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c nh\u01b0 d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i, d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 g\u1eafn nh&atilde;n, ti b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n v\u1edbi ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u v&agrave; ki\u1ec3u d&aacute;ng \u0111a d\u1ea1ng. V\u1edbi th\u1ebf m\u1ea1nh l&agrave; giao h&agrave;ng nhanh, s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ea1t ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao v&agrave; lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u1ee7 s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng h&agrave;ng giao cho qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok cam k\u1ebft s\u1ebd \u0111em \u0111\u1ebfn cho qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t tr&ecirc;n th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"695\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/img\/1.jpg\" width=\"1200\" \/><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>The quality of products and customer service are the two key foundations for the success of a company. Toska-Bano&#39;k - the world&#39;s leading brand of garment accessories with over 50 years experience has gained trust from the customers all around the world. In order to serve the needs of the world market quickly, Toska - Bano&#39;k has now expanded its production facilities and sales agents in South East Asia. In July 2014, Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd. was established and operated based on the &nbsp;&quot; Made in Viet Nam with Japanese Standard &quot;. Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd is specializing in supplying garment accessories such as string fasteners, tagpin with a variety of materials and models.We are committed to the quality as well as the accompanying criteria with the aim of providing customers with the best products in the garment accessories market<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"695\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/img\/1.jpg\" width=\"1200\" \/><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"gioi-thieu-chung","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"2","icon":"","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1590205916","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"8687","step":"1","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Gi\u1edbi Thi\u1ec7u Chung","seo_title_en":"About Us","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Gi\u1edbi Thi\u1ec7u Chung","seo_keywords_en":"About Us","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Gi\u1edbi Thi\u1ec7u Chung","seo_description_en":"About Us","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"1":{"id":"1","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng Nh\u1eadn Ch\u1ea5t L\u01b0\u1ee3ng","tenbaiviet_en":"Quality certification","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; ch&iacute;nh th\u1ee9c c\u1ea5p ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn Ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n T&aacute;i ch\u1ebf To&agrave;n c\u1ea7u &ndash; Global Recycled Standard (GRS) cho c&ocirc;ng ty TNHH Van Nang Banok.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; Global Recycle Standard) \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c Control Union Certifications ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2008.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">Sau \u0111&oacute; ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf quy \u0111\u1ecbnh c&aacute;c y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u01b0 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf h&oacute;a ch\u1ea5t&hellip;M\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch c\u1ee7a ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n GRS \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; d&ugrave;ng \u0111\u1ec3 x&aacute;c nh\u1eadn th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v&agrave; c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c&oacute; tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng cho c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty, doanh nghi\u1ec7p s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"232\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/download%20(2).png\" width=\"500\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p align=\"justify\" style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; margin-bottom:6.3000pt; margin-left:0.6000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">On October 20, 2022, Intertek Company officially granted the Global Recycling Standard (GRS) certificate to Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; margin-bottom:6.3000pt; margin-left:0.6000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">&nbsp;The Global Recycle Standard (GRS) was developed by Control Union Certifications in 2008. Three years later, the standard was transferred to the management of the Textile Exchange.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; margin-bottom:6.3000pt; margin-left:0.6000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">This is an international product standard that specifies requirements for environmentally friendly practices such as recycled ingredients, restriction of chemicals, etc. The purpose of the GRS standard is to certify ingredients. Recycling. of products and production activities are responsible for environmental protection for manufacturing companies and enterprises.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"232\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/download%20(2).png\" width=\"500\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; margin-bottom:6.3000pt; margin-left:0.6000pt; text-align:justify\">&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"chung-nhan-chat-luong","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"1","icon":null,"icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1590216846","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"7150","step":"1","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng Nh\u1eadn Ch\u1ea5t L\u01b0\u1ee3ng","seo_title_en":"Quality certification","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng Nh\u1eadn Ch\u1ea5t L\u01b0\u1ee3ng","seo_keywords_en":"Quality certification","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng Nh\u1eadn Ch\u1ea5t L\u01b0\u1ee3ng","seo_description_en":"Quality certification","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""}}
